About Us

They think and explore new ways to make our day to day life easier and better by implementing their billion dollar ideas on the ground.
Their ideas have the potential to change our world forever. Today, there are many examples like Oyo, Paytm, Google, Facebook, HP, Apple, Uber, Tesla, Yulu, etc. who started their journey as a startup and have changed our world forever from their unique offerings.
There are many more startup leaders who also have similar big ideas and are daring to change this world but COVID19 has impacted their life and work badly. These thought leaders need our help now much more than ever before.

Prabisha Consulting, a trusted name in the area of Digital Marketing, Graphics Design and Technology Development is launching an initiative to help such start up leaders express their big ideas and share their dreams with all of us. We need to share their wonderful ideas and let them go far and wide to help the human kind get the best of these super leaders. We need to cut the clutter and provide them equitable opportunity and a promising platform for help, support and visibility.
Every week, promising Start up Leaders will share their thoughts, work, learnings and future plans on the platform of Prabisha Startup Network. Join us in this mission to help our thought leaders achieve their full potential.
How we are planning to create a startup ecosystem?
PSN Membership

Every week, promising Startup leaders will share their thoughts, work, learnings and future plans on our platform. This would be further amplified by PSN team on a number of online and offline platforms for greater visibility.
Who are startup leaders?

Start Up leaders are real change makers of our times. They dare to dream. They think and explore new ways to make our day to day life easier and better by implementing their billion dollar ideas on the ground. Their ideas have the potential to change our world forever. Today, there are many examples like Oyo, Paytm, Google, Facebook, HP, Apple, Uber, Tesla, Yulu, etc. who started their journey as a startup and have changed our world forever from their unique offerings. There are many more startup leaders who also have similar big ideas and are daring to change this world but COVID19 has impacted their life and work badly. These thought leaders need our help now much more than ever before.

1. How Indian Start-ups are helping in nation Building

India is remarkably growing and developing among various sectors of the Industry such as FINTECH, AI (artificial intelligence), MedTech, hospitality, automobiles, and more. Here, start-ups play a significant role. Start-ups are small companies with fewer funds and few entrepreneurs, But despite being a small company it has an immense role to play in economic growth and development. They also help in contributing to innovation and injecting competition. Allowing the start-ups to bring a ray of hope to the people that lack capital shouldn’t be the restrictive factor.
An idea, no matter how small can be the new big innovation out there. Today, the building of a nation depends on the quality and scale of start-ups that any country possesses. In India, there is a rise in the number of start-ups from the previous year. India has become a hub of creativity where people are keen to learn, explore, and are hardworking which results in pushing up several new start-ups. There was an addition of about more than 1300 start-ups from distinct sectors in 2019. These start-ups allow entrepreneurs to show their creativity and also provide them with the platform for the same. Due to these start-ups, there is a great jump in employment. Every new start-up needs a team, workers, staff to work along with.
Around 500 million users of the Internet are from rural areas and the smaller town of India. Start-ups have also resulted in removing the gap between urban and rural areas, instead, they also allow them to learn and showcase their talent in front of the whole society. Start-ups have become the resource for the people who have talent but due to lack of money and technology they are not able to accomplish their dreams. Many successful start-ups have shown tremendous results in very little time such as One97 (Paytm) industry, Ola cabs, Snapdeal, Swiggy, Zomato, and many more. The Government of India has also supported our youth with their projects and has taken adequate steps to promote the culture of entrepreneurship in the country.
Start-up India initiative (or start-up India program) was launched by the Indian Government in 2016 for supporting entrepreneurs by building a robust start-up ecosystem, giving them funding support and the government also started ‘GeM Start-up Runway’ is a special concept launched by GeM (Government e-marketplace) in partnership with Start-up India. The platform grants an opportunity for start-ups where they can directly get orders from government buyers. Under the Start-up India program, the government also created the ‘Fund of funds of start-ups(FFS) with a collection of INR 10,000 crore funding promising start-ups.
We have already witnessed a lot of successful businesses that started as mere start-ups and a lot more are yet to come. Start-up indeed is the seeds that help to grow a more powerful and technically strong nation. India is on the path to build a nation that attracts and inspires not only the citizens of our county but also other nations. Start-ups are playing a key role in economic growth and they create more jobs which mean more employment and which results in an improved economy.
2. Build your own Cloud Storage System using Nextcloud

Why waste valuable storage space on your PC or phone when you can store documents and media in the cloud? Computer systems have been steadily moving away from local storage to remote, server based storage and processing – which is also known as the cloud. Is cloud storage really needed? Cloud storage is ideal when you want to access your personal files, documents, videos or images quickly. With the cloud, your data is stored on hardware that is in a remote physical location, which can then be accessed from any device over the Internet. Cloud storage delivers a cost-effective, scalable alternative to storing files in on-premise hard drives or storage networks. If you don’t yet have a service for storing and syncing your data in the cloud, you should seriously consider using one.
3. Build a Backup and Recovery Solution with Duplicati

Data volume has been growing exponentially, and dramatically increasing opportunities for theft and accidental disclosure of sensitive information as well as sequential data loss. The most important preventive measure against data loss is to back up all your data and create recovery mechanisms. There can be various situations that might result in loss of data. For example, a computer or hard drive failure could make data irretrievable, or even theft of a computer system could lead to loss of information. There is always the possibility of a virus or malware being introduced to a computer, which can erase a hard drive or prevent anyone from accessing it. Natural calamities such as fire, flood, or an earthquake could lead to computer damage, preventing you from accessing files on your computer. Data loss can happen to anyone at any time, and it might happen when we least expect it or are least prepared. So, you need to have your data backed up and available. Data backup is the best strategy to recover from accidental or malicious data loss.

Samagraa is an independent, non profit, non government charitable trust. It is a passion project, run by enthusiasts for the well being and to bridge the academic and social gap of children coming from economically weak backgrounds who have gained admission in premier, mainstream schools of Delhi, under the Right to Education act, in the EWS category. Our mission is to empower these kids to strike a balance for a better socio- economic development in their lives. Our Aim is to maximise the benefit these children have been given due to the government’s policy of inclusion and help them take a leap in life, by enhancing their skills.

To develop happy, responsible, sensitive, academically oriented, balanced kids . To train the children to set themselves clear goals and to encourage and direct them to work towards achieving them. To empower the children with the skills of rationalization, to enable them to take critical life decisions later. To inspire individual, responsible, creative thinking.

Wings Within is an organization catering to end-to-end solutions in the area of Emotional Wellness, Special Education needs, Life Skills coaching, Psychological Assessments, research and training. Counseling relationships will vary according to need but may be concerned with developmental issues, addressing and resolving specific problems, making informed decisions, coping with crisis. We offer state-of-the-art psychological assessments to help arrive at logical hypotheses about individuals and their behavior, personality, preferences and capabilities. Psychological assessment is also known as psychological testing or battery assessment. With Life Skills coaching, we set robust platform to explore abilities for adaptive and positive behavior that enables individuals to deal effectively with the demands and challenges of everyday life. We customize our programs to align with counselees or clients requirements by providing 1 on 1 (face to face) interaction, email communication, over phone and at work place.

We connect blood donor with blood seeker so that a donor can see visible impact created by their blood in someone’s life . Our platform connects blood donors and blood seekers on real time which reduces time.

How do we become a member?

You can join us through any of the platforms/channels.

Is there any criteria that you look for before publishing a startup story?

Although our focus areas are technology, education, women empowerment, healthcare, rural development and social sector but we wish to encourage all the thought leaders who have dared to bring a change.
What all platforms do you publish your stories on?
Linkedin, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube are some of the social media platforms we are using at pres
What are the various modes in which you conduct the interviews ?
We conduct interviews through online video platforms.
If I come to you with an idea in what all ways will you be able to help me?

We would be able to help you with various. services like digital marketing, web development, graphic designing at a reasonable cost. Not only this but we would be able to provide all other resources through our vast startup network which is growing fast.
What are the benefits of being a part of Prabisha Startup Network?
It would help you reach out to the larger audience. It will give you a platform wherein you can share, collaborate and innovate new ideas with other thought leaders.
Do you charge any fee for interviewing or sharing success stories of startups?
No, We do not charge any fees. You only need to get in touch with us to proceed further.
What is the eligibility criteria to join PSN?
Your startup should be 6 months to 5 years old.The offerings can be regular/unique.
Why do Investors invest in Startups?

Investing in startups is a risky proposition, but the low requirement for overhead capital combined with high upside potential, makes it lucrative for investors to put their bets on startups.
The Thomson Reuters Venture Capital Research Index replicated the performance of the venture capital industry in 2012 and found that overall venture capital has returned at an annual rate of 20% since 1996 – far outperforming modest returns of 7.5% and 5.9% from public equities and bonds respectively.

Prabisha is focused on providing customised business solutions to budding and visionary Entrepreneurs and Startup Leaders. They provide their services in the areas of 3D’s – Development, Design and Digital Marketing.

Learning and development is quintessential for any organization. By constantly up-skilling employees, companies grow and add more value. It also plays a critical role in employee engagement.
Fast growing start ups need support to help them in L and D and we aim to provide them support by identifying the L and D need and customised solutions with help of our partners.

Startups are seeds of a great revolution. If you have ideas, ingenuity and a passion for developing something new, making a difference, come and be a part of our team. Together, we work to bring meaningful and sustainable change to make this world a better place for everyone.
